Bottlesmoker Akan Tampil di LUCFest Taiwan
03 Nov 2019, 05:49 by Windy Eka Pramudya
BAGI Bottlesmoker, tampil di festival musik luar negeri bukanlah hal baru. Akan tetapi, tampil di luar negeri selalu memberi pengalaman baru. Setelah unjuk gigi di APT9 Summer Festival Australia, Bottlesmoker yang dihuni Angkuy dan Nobie akan berangkat ke Taiwan untuk tampil di LUCfest. 
Di Taiwan, LUCFest merupakan festival yang mengkombinasikan pertunjukkan musik dan konferensi yang menghubungkan para musisi dari berbagai negara dengan industri musik global. Berlangsung selama tiga hari, yaitu 8 -10 November 2019 di Kota Tainan, LUCfest merupakan salah satu festival musik besar di Taiwan yang menyajikan 60 artis dari berbagai negara di enam panggung sekitar Kota Tainan. 
Selain menampilkan aksi musisi, LUCFest juga mengundang pihak-pihak dari perusahaan rekaman, label, kurator festival, dan media untuk terciptanya hubungan dan peluang bisnis dalam industri musik. Untuk itulah, selain pertunjukan musik, LUCFest menghadirkan delapan program konferensi musik yang memberikan kesempatan bagi para musisi untuk bertukar banyak hal tentang industri musik."Bisa hadir di LUCFest menjadi kesempatan yang baik untuk mengenalkan musik kami dan memberikan pandangan tentang musik di Indonesia kepada publik global. Soalnya, selain akan tampil di penutupan festival, kami juga dijadwalkan sebagai pembicara di konferensi tentang industri musik di Indonesia," tutur Angkuy lewat pos-el, Minggu, 3 November 2019.
Di LucFest, Bottlesmoker juga akan menjadi konduktor lokakarya tentang ecstatic dance atau aktivitas yang menggabungkan unsur musik dan gerak tubuh. Untuk Bottlesmoker ini merupakan pengalaman yang sangat penting karena bisa mengenalkan musiknya jadi lebih jauh. 
Bottlesmoker menjadi musisi kedua Indonesia yang masuk di festival ini. Pada 2018, penyanyi Rayssa Dynta pernah tampil di LUCFest ini. Bisa tampil di LUCFest menjadi prestasi baru untuk Bottlesmoker, karena mereka bisa melanjutkan jejaring untuk memperkenalkan musik dari Indonesia. 
"Kami bersyukur memiliki kesempatan lebih jauh untuk mengenalkan musik kami. Pasalnya, musik elektronik yang kami mainkan cenderung segmented di Indonesia. Menjadi bagian dari LUCFest memberi banyak peluang baru bagi kami, memberi banyak motivasi untuk tetap meyakini apa yang kami jalankan bersama Bottlesmoker," kata Angkuy. 
Menyambut penampilan Bottlesmoker di LUCFest Taiwan, Iceperience.id memberi dukungan kepada Bottlesmoker melalui gerakan #localicemovement. Gerakan ini mendukung para musisi electronik di Indonesia agar membentuk ekosistem musik yang berkualitas. Alhasil mereka bisa terus berkarya, tampil, dan mendapatkan pengakuan di negeri sendiri dan di level internasional.  
"Dengan spirit #localicemovement, kami ingin para musisi Indonesia bisa berkembang dan menembus pasar internasional. Dengan dukungan penuh yang kami berikan kepada mereka, mereka dapat menciptakan legacy mereka sendiri," ujar Sigit Diapsoputra perwakilan Iceperience.id.***

Bottlesmoker Will Perform at LUCFest Taiwan
03 Nov 2019, 05:49 by Windy Eka Pramudya
FOR Bottlesmoker, performing at foreign music festivals is not new. However, appearing abroad always gives a new experience. After a performance at the APT9 Summer Festival Australia, Bottlesmoker inhabited by Angkuy and Nobie will go to Taiwan to perform at LUCfest.
In Taiwan, LUCFest is a festival that combines music shows and conferences that connect musicians from various countries with the global music industry. Holding for three days, 8 November 10-2019 in Tainan City, LUCfest is one of the major music festivals in Taiwan that presents 60 artists from various countries on six stages around Tainan City.
In addition to presenting musician acts, LUCFest also invited parties from record companies, labels, festival curators and the media to create business relationships and opportunities in the music industry. For this reason, in addition to music performances, LUCFest presents eight music conference programs that provide opportunities for musicians to exchange many things about the music industry. "Being able to present at LUCFest is a good opportunity to introduce our music and provide a view of music in Indonesia to the global public. "The thing is, in addition to performing at the closing of the festival, we are also scheduled to be speakers at a conference on the music industry in Indonesia," Angkuy said by e-mail, Sunday, November 3, 2019.
At LucFest, Bottlesmoker will also be a conductor of a workshop on ecstatic dance or activities that combine elements of music and gestures. For Bottlesmoker this is a very important experience because it can introduce the music even further.
Bottlesmoker became the second Indonesian musician to enter the festival. In 2018, singer Rayssa Dynta performed at this LUCFest. Being able to perform at LUCFest is a new achievement for Bottlesmoker, because they can continue the network to introduce music from Indonesia.
"We are grateful to have further opportunities to introduce our music. The reason is that the electronic music that we play tends to be segmented in Indonesia. Being part of LUCFest gives us many new opportunities, gives us a lot of motivation to continue to believe what we are running with Bottlesmoker," said Angkuy.
Welcoming the Bottlesmoker appearance at LUCFest Taiwan, Iceperience.id gave support to Bottlesmoker through the #localicemovement movement. This movement supports electronic musicians in Indonesia to form a quality music ecosystem. As a result they can continue to work, perform, and get recognition in their own country and at the international level.
"With the spirit of #localicemovement, we want Indonesian musicians to develop and penetrate the international market. With the full support we provide them, they can create their own legacy," Sigit Diapsoputra, representative of Iceperience.id. ***
